site_name: Martin's Famous Potato Rolls and Bread
author: Martin's Famous Potato Rolls and Bread
title: Cheesy Roast Beef Sliders
ingredients: Salt and Black Pepper, to taste
1 Package Martin’s Sweet Dinner Potato Rolls (12 Rolls)
Salt and Black Pepper, to taste
1 Package Martin’s Sweet Dinner Potato Rolls (12 Rolls)

instructions:
In a large skillet, butter over medium heat.
Once the butter is melted, add the sliced onions.
Stir the onions occasionally with a wooden spoon. Continue to cook over medium-high heat until the onions are translucent.
Cook for about 20 minutes on medium heat. Or until the onions are soft and nicely golden brown in color. Add the brown sugar, salt and pepper. Season with Worcestershire sauce. Remove from the heat.
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
Cut Martin’s Sweet Dinner Potato Rolls in half. Place the bottom halves of the buns on a half sheet pan and toast in oven for 7-10 minutes until lightly toasted. Remove from oven. Spread with mayonnaise. Top each bun with a slice of roast beef. Spoon caramelized onions over the roast beef. Top with slices of cheese. Add the tops of the rolls and brush with butter.
Cover entire sheet pan with aluminum foil. Bake for 15 minutes. Uncover and bake until the cheese is melted, about 5 minutes.
Let cool a few minutes before serving.
